description: Returns a portion of a datatable into a new datatable selected from `begin` to `end`.

input.name: begin
input.description:
One-based index at which to begin extraction.
A negative index can be used, indicating an offset from the end of the datatable.
Defaults to `1` (first row in the datatable).

input.name: end
input.description:
One-based index at which to end extraction.
A negative index can be used, indicating an offset from the end of the datatable.
Defaults to `-1` (the last row in the datatable).

input.name: limit
input.description:
A positive integer specifying a limit on the number of rows to be extracted.
Defaults to `null` (no limit).

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable containing the extracted rows.
